intro.intro_para_1: I'm a frontend developer, optimist, and community builder. I currently work as the VP of Product at Vercel, where I help teach the Next.js Next.js community, an open-source web framework built with React.
intro.intro_para_2: I create educational content for developers, writing about web development, JavaScript and TypeScript, React and Next.js, and more. This comes in all forms: blog posts, videos, tweets, conference talks, and workshops. You can watch some of my favorites below.
